title: Key Bindings and Left Click
body:
So a while back I decided to set my left click to attack move using this guide: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1bo2nk/guide_to_easy_kiting_left_click_attack and it worked.

Now, a lot later, I have decided that I no longer want to do that because it is an inconvenience not being able to use my left click normally. I have tried resetting my key bindings in game, which made it so left click no longer does attack move but did not change anything else back. I then deleted the input.ini file, which did nothing for me. Then I ran a repair and that did not work either.

Then I tried making a new input.ini and putting that info back into it and then changing everything back to the default, which oddly also did not fix the issue, so now here I am.

Does anybody know a fix for my issue? Thank you in advance for the help! ^.^

replies.body:
Heya
Delete the input.ini and the .json file in the same folder. Then you should be good.

Regards Rkoturdo

> [{quoted}](name=Rkoturdo Ndo,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mVERkEoe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-05T13:13:02.929+0000)
>
> Heya
> Delete the input.ini and the .json file in the same folder. Then you should be good.
> 
> Regards Rkoturdo

Thank you very much, it worked out for me! ^.^
